message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO

This paper deals with multi-task learning using convolutional neural networks for vision-based road scene understanding. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses the use of auxiliary tasks as a form of regularization, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper uses synthetic data, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of neural networks for multi-task learning also falls under the category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE). Finally, the application of the proposed method to road scene understanding suggests that the paper may also belong to the category of robotics (cs.RO).
